page.title: 03RELIGION FESTIVAL EID LUTON
page.content: Eid is a special day for Muslims. There are two celebrations one is small Eid the other big Eid. Before Eid some Muslims fast, this means they do not eat or drink anything until 9pm. When Eid begins lots of special things are eaten samosa, pilau rice,sweet rice. Chidren also get presents of money. On this special day the men and the boys go to the mosque. The mums and girls stay behind and prepare the food for the evening. During the day people visit each others houses and the children have a day off school. There are lots of Muslim children living in our Domesday area.
